official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for adoption expenses.

summary.text: Adoption Tax Relief Act of 1992 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an itemized deduction for adoption expenses which include: (1) reasonable and necessary legal costs; and (2) travel expenses incurred while away from home arranging the adoption or for transportation of the child to the home of the taxpayer.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for adoption expenses.
